description: Schema for the Beacon request. It is named `RequestBody` to keep the same nomenclature used by OpenAPI v3, but it actually contains the definition of the whole HTTP POST request payload.

meta.description: Information that is relevant to build the response.

query.description: Parameters to limit the list of returned results.

filters.description: Ontology based filters. Using CURIE syntax is encouraged.

pagination.description: Pagination to apply on the results.

requestedGranularity.description: Requested granularity. Targeted Beacon could respond or not with the requested granularity. E.g. record level granularity could be requested, but the Beacon could respond only with boolean or count results.

testMode.description: Used for indicating that a request or response is done in a test context. Purposed for compliance testing.
